name: Cute Animals JigSaw Puzzle 123
description:
A large collection of hand drawn cute animals jigsaw puzzle for kids. Cute Animals and playful animations creates an app for hours of fun, enjoyment and learning for your children.

Choose from more than 30 animals and one of 5 different puzzle sizes. Attractive background masks creates 600+ combinations of puzzles. Use the hint button, choose different puzzle pieces to fill puzzle, drag and dock into place. Pieces automatically change and refresh for easy handling.

Develop your children in the following areas:

- Problem Solving
- Memory
- Concentration
- Logical and cognitive skills

This game features a variety of cute animals in the puzzle

- Koala
- Racoon
- Bear
- Lion
- Kangaroo
- Frog
- Owl
- Rabbit
- Giraffe
- Snake
- Elephant
- Cow
- Cheetah
- Monkey
- Deer
- Hippo
- Zebra, and many more...

Download this game today to entertain and develop your child!!
